description: The start time of the observation sequence.
name: sequence_time

description: The start time of the individual image.
name: image_time

description: The x pixel position on the original image.
name: image_x

description: The y pixel position on the original image.
name: image_y

description: The pixel index of the stamp for this source. The stamp is always a square and this index represents the flattened position.
name: pixel_index

description: The value of the pixel at the given position.
name: pixel_value
